title: Q & A
subtitle: For all our friends and family who have lots of questions, please check out our FAQ first!

questionsAnswers.q: Whom should I call with questions?

questionsAnswers.a:
For ceremony please park on Doroty Street

For reception please use Łódź Art Center's car park

questionsAnswers.q: Will I have to pay for parking?
questionsAnswers.a: Both parkings are free, including parking on the street outside Łódź Art Center

questionsAnswers.q: Is there transportation being provided between registry office and reception?
questionsAnswers.a:
No, if you don't have your own transport you can either take a taxi, tram nr 6 or 11B from Piotrkowska/pl. Katedralny to Piotrkowska/pl. Niepodległości stop or walk.

In both cases, the journey should take 15-20 minutes

questionsAnswers.q: What should/could I do between the ceremony and the reception?
questionsAnswers.a: The reception starts straight after the ceremony. You might need around 15 minutes to get to the reception place

questionsAnswers.q: Is the wedding indoors or outdoors?

questionsAnswers.a: Yes, we hope you'll enjoy it!

questionsAnswers.q: Will alcohol be served at the party?
questionsAnswers.a: Yes, guests will have access to open bar, full of of delicious cocktails, Scottish whisky and Polish regional beer

questionsAnswers.q: What if I have a dietary restriction?
questionsAnswers.a: Let us know if you have any dietary restrictions

questionsAnswers.q: How can I help the couple have the best time during their wedding day?
questionsAnswers.a: Smile, talk, dance, have a good time! 😁
